PARAGRAPH.STRING: is a non-self-governing colonial territory of New Zealand that comprises a group of three tropical coral atolls in the South Pacific Ocean.
are occasionally referred to by Westerners by an older colonial name, The Union Islands. Until 1976, the official name was Tokelau Islands. The United Nations Committee on Decolonization includes
on the United Nations list of Non-Self-Governing Territories.
is, according to the CIA World Factbook list of countries by GDP, the poorest country in the world.
